title: on me by section 8 of the Harbours Act 2015 (No. 61 of 2015) (as adapted by
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Harbours Act 2015 (Galway Harbour
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Harbours Act 2015 (Galway Harbour 

Company Transfer Day) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited harbour act 2015 (galway harbour company transfer day) order 2020

title: on me by section 8 of the Harbours Act 2015 (No. 61 of 2015) (as adapted by
heading: 2. Ownership of all shares in the share capital of Galway Harbour
text_raw:
2. Ownership of all shares in the share capital of Galway Harbour 

Company - 

(a) held by the Minister and the Minister for Public Expenditure and 

Reform, and 

(b) held in trust for the Minister, 

shall vest in Galway City Council on the 1st day of January 2021, without the 
need for any instrument of transfer or other form of assignment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I, MICHAEL MCGRATH, Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform 
consent to the making of the foregoing Order. 

[661] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

I, PETER BURKE, Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, in exercise of the powers delegated to me by the 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial 
Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 559 of 2020), consent to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 17 December 2020 

PETER BURKE, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 December, 2020. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [661] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó
